home.parrafo-info: Creation of desktop and mobile applications tailored to the specific needs of each client. From business tools to interactive solutions, the development ensures functionality, intuitive design, and high performance across various platforms.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a Senior Programming Technician specializing in custom application development for desktop and mobile platforms.
My focus is on creating functional and tailored solutions adapted to the needs of each project.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Web/mobile application where purchase requests are submitted and either approved or rejected, followed by the purchasing process and tracking of the goods.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Web/mobile application for tracking animals from birth to their potential sale or death, covering processes such as health management and livestock movements.
